name: Return to Ithaca
description:
"Tell me, O Muse, of the man of many devices, who wandered full many ways after he had sacked the sacred citadel of Troy."

You are Odysseus, finally returning home after a 10-year-long journey. But all is not well in your home of Ithaca: suitors have been courting your wife and eating all your food.

It is up to you and a few loyal others to slay them all!
